templateDefinitions.name: EKS_DEBUGEKM_E
templateDefinitions.description: Turn debug messaging on or off

statements.statement:
select debug_status = if (d.seq = 1) "On for subsequent Evoke Templates" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Off for subsequent Evoke Templates" elseif (d.seq = 3) "On for all Logic Templates" elseif (d.seq = 4) "On for all Action Templates" elseif (d.seq = 5) "On for all Logic and Action Templates" elseif (d.seq = 6) "To FullAudit for this module only" elseif (d.seq = 7) "Additional EKSDATA logging" ENDIF, _hidden = if (d.seq = 1) 1 elseif (d.seq=2) 0 elseif (d.seq=3) 2 elseif (d.seq=4) 3 elseif (d.seq=5) 4 elseif (d.seq=6) 5 elseif (d.seq=7) 6 endif
FROM (DUMMYT D WITH SEQ = VALUE(7))

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_APPLICATION_E
templateDefinitions.definition: The application being used QUALIFIER APPLICATION
templateDefinitions.description: Application that generated the evoking event

statements.statement: select Application_Name = ap.description, _hidden = ap.application_number from application ap where ap.active_ind = 1 /*and (ap.direct_access_ind = 1 or ap.application_number in (961000,600005,380000)) */ and ap.application_number > 0 and ap.description > " " order application_name

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_E
templateDefinitions.definition: the triggering request contains an order ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS whose ordering physician OPT_QUALIFIER in OPT_ORDDOC

statements.statement: select if (par1 ="OTHER") from prsnl pl where pl.name_full_formatted != " " and pl.name_full_formatted not between "0*" and "Z*" and pl.active_ind = 1 and pl.physician_ind = 1 elseif (par1="ALL") from prsnl pl where pl.name_full_formatted != " " and pl.active_ind=1 and pl.physician_ind = 1 else from prsnl pl where pl.physician_ind = 1 and pl.active_ind=1 and cnvtupper(pl.name_full_formatted)=patstring(concat(substring(1,1,par1),"*")) endif pl.name_full_formatted, _hidden=pl.person_id order name_full_formatted

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_DETAIL_E
templateDefinitions.definition: orders exist ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS where order detail ORDER_DETAIL QUALIFIER LIST1 and OPT_LIST2

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_STOP_LOGIC_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the following templates are false, MODE logic evaluation
templateDefinitions.description: Used to control efficiency of Action Group rules

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_INCOMING_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: orders exist ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS where order detail ORDER_DETAIL QUALIFIER LIST1 and OPT_LIST2

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CALC_SAVE_L
templateDefinitions.description: Create a value to be used by subsequent templates

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ALERT_FLEX_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Send alert OPT_TITLE stating TXT, OPT_CANCEL_LABEL, OPT_IGNORE_LABEL, OPT_OVERRIDE_REASON, OPT_MODIFY_LABEL, OPT_DEFAULT_LABEL, OPT_ORDERS, OPT_DEFAULT_FIRST_ORDER, OPT_URL_BUTTON_NAME, OPT_URL_ADDRESS, OK_BUTTON_NAME, OPT_FORM, OPT_FORM_BUTTON_NAME, OPT_FORCE_FORM, OPT_LINK

statements.statement: select distinct Form_Definition = if (t.seq = 1) dfr.definition else "*NONE" endif, _hidden = if (t.seq = 1) dfr.dcp_forms_ref_id else 0.0 endif, Description = if (t.seq = 1) dfr.description else "NONE" endif from dcp_forms_ref dfr, (dummyt t with seq=2) plan dfr where dfr.active_ind = 1 and textlen(trim(dfr.definition)) > 0 and textlen(trim(dfr.definition)) > 0 join t order Form_Definition

column.value: PowerPorm must be opened, dismiss Alert
PowerForm must be signed, dismiss Alert

values.value: To FullAudit for this module only

value.value: @NEWLINEselect from @NEWLINEeem_abn_check e,@NEWLINEeem_abn_low el@NEWLINE@NEWLINEplan e@NEWLINEwhere e.parent1_id = trigger_orderid @NEWLINEand e.abn_check_id = (select max(abn_check_id)from eem_abn_check where parent1_id = trigger_orderid)@NEWLINE@NEWLINE@NEWLINEjoin el@NEWLINEwhere el.abn_check_id = e.abn_check_id@NEWLINEand el.low_status_meaning = "RSD01"@NEWLINE@NEWLINE@NEWLINEhead report@NEWLINE@NEWLINE log_retval = 0@NEWLINE@NEWLINE log_message = "check abn_check_id"@NEWLINE@NEWLINEdetail@NEWLINE@NEWLINE log_misc1 = trim(el.low_status_detail_txt)@NEWLINE@NEWLINE log_retval = 100@NEWLINE@NEWLINE log_message = concat("Status is: ", log_misc1)@NEWLINE@NEWLINEwith nocounter, nullreport go@NEWLINE

@NEWLINEselect from @NEWLINEeem_abn_check e,@NEWLINEeem_abn_low el@NEWLINE@NEWLINEplan e@NEWLINEwhere e.parent1_id = trigger_orderid @NEWLINEand e.abn_check_id = (select max(abn_check_id)from eem_abn_check where parent1_id = trigger_orderid)@NEWLINE@NEWLINE@NEWLINEjoin el@NEWLINEwhere el.abn_check_id = e.abn_check_id@NEWLINEand el.low_status_meaning = "R_FREQ01"@NEWLINEand el.abn_check_id not in (select abn_check_id from@NEWLINEeem_abn_low where low_status_meaning != "R_FREQ01")@NEWLINE@NEWLINE@NEWLINEhead report@NEWLINE@NEWLINE log_retval = 0@NEWLINE@NEWLINE log_message = "check abn_check_id"@NEWLINE@NEWLINEdetail@NEWLINE@NEWLINE log_misc1 = trim(el.low_status_detail_txt)@NEWLINE@NEWLINE log_retval = 100@NEWLINE@NEWLINE log_message = concat("Status is: ", log_misc1)@NEWLINE@NEWLINEwith nocounter, nullreport go@NEWLINE

@NEWLINEselect from @NEWLINEeem_abn_check e,@NEWLINElong_text lt@NEWLINE@NEWLINEplan e@NEWLINEwhere e.parent1_id = trigger_orderid @NEWLINEand e.abn_check_id = (select max(abn_check_id)from eem_abn_check where parent1_id = trigger_orderid)@NEWLINE@NEWLINE@NEWLINEjoin lt@NEWLINEwhere lt.parent_entity_id = e.abn_check_id@NEWLINEand lt.parent_entity_name = "EEM_ABN_CHECK"@NEWLINEand lt.long_text like "*.pdf"@NEWLINE@NEWLINE@NEWLINEhead report@NEWLINE@NEWLINE log_retval = 0@NEWLINE@NEWLINE log_message = "check abn_check_id"@NEWLINE@NEWLINEdetail@NEWLINE@NEWLINE log_misc1 = substring(13,50,lt.long_text)@NEWLINE@NEWLINE log_retval = 100@NEWLINE@NEWLINE log_message = concat("URL IS: ", log_misc1)@NEWLINE@NEWLINEwith nocounter, nullreport go@NEWLINE
@MISC:4@NEWLINE@NEWLINE@NEWLINEYou can access the dx list here:@NEWLINE@NEWLINE@NEWLINE@MISC:6

Please be aware this test has a frequency limitation, you might ask the patient if they've had this performed/collected within the timeframe below to ensure their coverage.@NEWLINE@NEWLINE@MISC:5@NEWLINE@NEWLINE@NEWLINE
